title: Pixel 4a self-populating icons on the lowest row of every screen: can I turn this off?
content: The icons in the lowest row of every screen of my new Pixel 4a are self-populating. They appear to be the most recently used apps. Don't want them there, don't need them there. Can I turn this "feature" off and use the lowest row for my own selected icons, or just leave the row blank?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
